statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 1 , -x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + x - 6 , -12 \, x^{3} - 16 \, x^{2} - 20 \, x + 4 , 6 \, x^{3} + 8 \, x^{2} + 10 \, x - 2 , -6 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 4 \, x + 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
